document.full_text: the american civil liberties union said on thursday it wants to know how the michigan state police have been using devices capable of downloading text messages, address books and other data from cell phones.
document.title: michigan police and aclu in flap over cell phone downloads
lines_and_colors: the american civil liberties union said on thursday it wants to know how the michigan state police have been using devices capable of downloading text messages, address books and other data from cell phones.
